name: Prestige Cookie Idle Type
description:
So , this is my first ever idle type game.

Updates will follow with more stuff like: Eternal Points (second prestige layer), Options menue, Prestige Points Shop, Music, and more.

If you have any suggestions I can implement in the game consider writing me per:

E-Mail: boblobbyhulker.jel@gmail.com

With that said have fun playing and gathering "cookies" for now
